item.title: Rework Blog
item.description: Here are some cool projects to give you inspiration for your #rework mods!
item.content:encoded:
Here are some cool projects to give you inspiration for your #rework mods!â€‹

https://github.com/kanin2/KevEnder - Full overhaul of an ender 3 to beat speed benchy records! https://kevinakasam.com/belt-driven-ender-3/ - Super popular mod to add belted z to your ender! https://github.com/Monolith3D/Monolith_Gantry - High performance gantry for Voron style printers. https://github.com/kevinakasam/KlackEnder-Probe - Simple Klicky probe for enders! https://github.com/thrutheframe/HULA_Voron - Fancy feet to make your table stable. https://github.com/lhndo/LH-Stinger/wiki/Pico-MMU - Low cost MMU for klipper. https://github.com/DraftShift/StealthChanger - Toolchanger for Voron style printers https://github.com/FrankenVoron/DoomCube-2 - Frame mod for Voron style printers https://www.printables.com/model/1236812-boombox-the-best-bowden-extruder-on-earth - High performance bowden extruder. https://www.printables.com/model/1287910-uap-toolhead - High performance toolhead for CoreXY machines.
